pages.text: $(li)The Crossbow is a medium range distance.$(br)$(li)To use it, you have to load the ammunition right clicking while you are holding the Crossbow in your hand.

$(li)Once charged, you can just right click again while you are holding the Crossbow to shoot.$(br)$(li)This weapon has less range than $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l) but inflicts more damage than this last one.
